title: Ogre-Headed Guardian Beast (Zhenmushou)
objectDate: Tang dynasty (618–907), first half of 8th century
medium: Earthenware with three-color (sancai) lead glazes and traces of pigments
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Charlotte Bordeaux, Pauline Wood Egan, Gordon P. O'Neill, John O'Neill III, Potter Palmer, Oakleigh B. Thorne, Honore Wamsler, and Arthur M. Wood, Jr.
